title: Growing Suspicions
description: It's suspicious because nothing looks suspicious, and if it looks suspicious from the start it's obviously suspicious.

title: Detective's Assistant
description: Now it's your business to know what other people don't know too.

title: Genius Detective
description: You're already a genius at unraveling mysteries... but how is it possible that everywhere you go someone ends up dead?

title: Golden Truth
description: You can solve any mystery by now. The path to the Golden Land has already been revealed to you.

title: Innocent One
description: Puritan, oblivious, or serial killer in the making? Either way, you made it through No Man's Land without glimpsing a single bra. Good job!

title: I Watch Anime Only for the "Plot"...
description: It's not your fault that there is so much fan service... Right?

title: Only Accidents! I Swear!
description: Physics in anime are incredible. When you trip, you always cop a feel.

title: Hentai Overlord
description: No use denying it! You know what you are...

title: History Class
description: History doesn't have to be boring. There's a lot to learn.

title: A Look at Passing Time
description: Instead of dreaming of the future, you prefer to look back at the past.

title: Archaeologist
description: You have learned that sometimes going further just isn't worth it. And yet you try.

title: Time Machine
description: Kids these days are boring. You'd rather watch something heart warming about siblings catching fireflies.

title: Paranoia Fuel
description: It's not like you needed to sleep tonight, anyway.

title: Too Many Teeth
description: You know something is following you. You just don't know what.

title: Extreme Phobia
description: You are terrified, you are transfixed.

title: Flowers of Flesh and Blood
description: It's far too late, now.

title: Me? PILOT This Thing?!
description: A secret organization wants you to pilot a huge mecha. Can you do it?

title: Engineer
description: After watching over 75 hours of meca anime you should be able to build your own mobile suit. Remember not to kill the rest of us.

title: Mechazawa
description: Having watched over 150 hours of mecha anime, you've probably become a robot already. Nice job, hero.

title: Pierce the HEAVENS!
description: Do the impossible. See the invisible. ROW ROW FIGHT THE POWAH! You just sang that in your head, didn't you?

title: Gettin' Your Keys On!
description: You don't know what you've just listened to, but you like it.

title: This Is Even Better Live
description: Proudly display the badges you have earned in the fancafe.

title: Dreaming of the City
description: Your musical knowledge has expanded so much you are tempted to make a career out of it.

title: Hall of Fame
description: The stage is now your second home.

title: Stalker
description: I'll stalk you so hard you won't notice me for 24 episodes. Why don't you love me yet?

title: Unrequited Love
description: If you won't confess, they'll never know how you feel. But don't bother if you're the best girl - these never win.

title: Sparkles and Bubbles
description: Every time you two get close you feel butterflies in your stomach. Now kiss.

title: Heart Full of Love
description: So many romance anime! You surely are an expert in relationships already.

title: 3... 2... 1... Liftoff!
description: You've taken one small step for man, not such a giant leap for mankind.

title: The Earth Looks So Small from Up Here
description: You're finally outside the atmosphere, but there's still a lot to explore.

title: Interstellar Traveler
description: You've traveled vast interstellar distances and seen many galaxies in your way.

title: Emperor of the Universe
description: You're the ruler of the whole Universe. There's no one with more power than you.

title: Knockout!
description: You've held your own in the ring, time to go all the way.

title: Get Your Head in the Game
description: The odds are against you, time to get in the zone.

title: Welcome to the Big Leagues
description: There's no stopping you, just one final push.

title: Olympian
description: First across the finish line, great job!

title: Normal High School Boy
description: Got started into the furious ride with slice-of-life anime.

title: Cute x ( Girls + Things )
description: Didn't get bored of watching cute girls doing cute things. As if that's possible.

title: Enjoying Life
description: Found the equilibrium between boring and interesting.

title: Prima Undine
description: Awarded Ph.D. degree in slice-of-life-ology. You can teach others how to stay calm and take it easy.

title: What Exactly Did I Just Watch?
description: You discovered a whole new world of weird. Keep on watching.

title: My Mind Is Full of Fuck
description: Your attempt to wrap your mind around this failed completely.

title: Is This the Real Life?
description: It has become hard to distinguish between reality and fiction.

title: Wired Sound
description: You've seen too much. You've transcended humanity and operate on another level now.

title: Eternal Spring
description: It all started one fateful morning in April...

title: At the Gates of Eden
description: You're so close to heaven, you can almost feel it.

title: Banquet of the Golden Witch
description: You've challenged her to a game. There is no turning back, now.

title: Hacking to the Gate
description: All these games have made of you a wizard. You can crack any code without breaking a sweat.

title: Uncharted Waters
description: You have just stumbled across a wonderful, strange new world.

title: Into the Jungle
description: The deeper you go, the less you want out.

title: Center of the Earth
description: You have forgotten about the outside world, nature has assimilated you. An apple falls - not only have you flowered, you have produced fruit.

title: Transcendence
description: You have been returned to the primordial ocean. From the highest point in the sky, you can peer into every universe, and lose yourself in an infinity of stories.

title: Cassette Tape
description: The first time you watched these, you didn't even know what they were.

title: Solid Color
description: Bomber jackets, high-waisted jeans, an overload of patterns, and bishies everywhere.

title: It's Raining... Tragic Backstories!
description: It might be the nostalgia lens, but you swear things had more substance back then.

title: Blockbuster
description: Man, do you feel old as all hell.

title: The first step
description: Watched 10 anime. Congratulations, you broke the magical number. Take a breath now, it will only get more difficult.

title: Casual watcher
description: Watched 20 anime. You're used to seeing character's eyes bigger than their nose. If they have any nose.

title: A millionaire
description: Watched 30 anime. You DID buy all of them, right?

title: Bragging rights
description: Watched 40 anime. That's... a lot. You can be proud of yourself, that's for sure.

title: A lot of free time
description: Watched 50 anime. Now pause, take a breath and stretch a bit. Remember not to sit too close to the screen.

title: Not Even My Final Form
description: Watched 60 anime. Your power level is way above others'. The only way is up.

title: Gotta Watch Them All!
description: Watched 70 anime. You should already know what that picture means.

title: The Collector
description: Watched 80 animes. No, wait. The plural of anime is anime.

title: The Maniac
description: Watched 90 anime. Is this healthy? You should contact your doctor.

title: The Legend
description: Watched 100 anime. You're one of the chosen ones. You don't even have to brag, since everyone heard about you.

title: Database Breaker
description: Watched 200 anime. Are you having fun, breaking all the rules?

title: This Is It
description: Watched 300 anime. There is no higher level. You can stop now. Everyone, go home.

title: Hair Antenna
description: Whose watch time are you calling puny?

title: Endurance Training
description: By doing a daily ten-episode run, you are sure to become a master in no time!

title: Consciousness Upload
description: Consuming the medium becomes a lot easier once you yourself are raw data.

title: Wicked Cultured
description: By making a deal with the devil, you have ensured access to even the most obscure of materials.

title: Less Than Three
description: Mean anime score lower than 3. Is it hate, or is it love?

title: Watching Anime Is Suffering
description: Mean anime score lower than 5. Someone has to counterweight the fanboys, right?

title: I Love Chinese Cartoons
description: Mean anime score higher than 8. How about using the whole scale and re-rating stuff? That could make you look less like a fanboy...

title: Chronomaster
description: Your discerning eye has traveled across the aeons of animation.

title: I Like Them Long
description: Didn't fall asleep while watching long anime series. 100 episodes isn't a big deal to you.

title: VHS Master Race
description: Watched 10 old anime. You overwrote my cartoons with The Karate Kid?! MOOOM!

title: Growing Suspicions
description: It's suspicious because nothing looks suspicious, and if it looks suspicious from the start it's obviously suspicious.

title: Detective's Assistant
description: Now it's your business to know what other people don't know too.

title: Genius Detective
description: You're already a genius at unraveling mysteries... but how is it possible that everywhere you go someone ends up dead?

title: Golden Truth
description: You can solve any mystery by now. The path to the Golden Land has already been revealed to you.
